post_subtitle: An open source rule matching system
abstract: An open source rule engine that follows a syntax inspired by Drools, but adapted for Flutter and Dart. The project contains a standard lexer and parser, which output is then used to compile the described rules into a RETE network.
author: Pieter Delobelle, Anton Danneels
background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, rgba(245, 239, 241, 1), rgba(245, 245, 245, 1), rgba(249, 240, 232, 1))
